about_the_game:
Chlorofell is an isometric action shooter focused on mastering quick thinking and manual reloading. You play as a soldier of nature’s wrath, and fight through a factory of environments where plants and technology collide, and squads of enemies coordinate to stop you.

With a limited shield covering your fragile amount of health, you can be easily overwhelmed, but through mastering the speed of movement, manual reloading, and the specialized ammo you’ll find along the way, you just may make it all the way to the source of this scourge and have the chance to finish this fight.



  • Tight movement and shooting in an isometric prospective
  • 4 levels to fight your way though
  • 3 special ammo types to discover and leverage
  • Focus-encouraging gameplay with manual reloading and a reload combo system



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

short_description: Master an arm cannon built from the scraps of your enemies, specialized ammo, and quick thinking, to tear your way to the heart of the mechanical scourge threatening your planet.
